roleset.name: get rid of in a hurry

role.descr: agent, entity getting rid of something

example.name: transitive
example.text: And while Polly Peck isn't jettisoning the existent top-managementstructure of Sansui, it is bringing in a former ToshibaCorp. executive as executive vice president and chief operatingofficer.

roleset.note: JETTISON-V NOTES: Based on sentences in the financial subcorpus. No corresponding VN or FN classes. updated 12/10 by Katie. (from jettison.01-v)
